review: RUTM is still a good game regardless of the negative reviews. It is far better than PRM.Sure, I agree with most of the previous comments, but its is a fair first game effort. Its not as polished to FM standards yet. But if the developers listen to Rugby gamers, it will surely improve with patches..Don't allow these negative comments stop you buying this game. You won't regret getiing a dud.I'd recommend this game to any serious Rugby fan.
